price: Бас, сиз Аллоҳга таваккул қилинг! Албатта, сиз очиқ-ойдин ҳақиқат устидадирсиз.
arabic: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innaka ʿalā al-ḥaqi al-mubīni
